name: Aquatic Eyes
summary: As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean.
description:
As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean. You gain low-light vision, or you gain darkvision if your ancestry already has low-light vision.

Special If your ancestry has neither low-light vision nor darkvision, you can take this ancestry feat a second time to gain darkvision. You can't retrain out of this feat.Traits

Undine: Undines are planar scions descended from marids.
